description: The controversial Visit Berlin advert is to highlight the importance of protecting the elderly.
title: Coronavirus: Berlin ad sticks middle finger to mask rule breakers
title_page: Coronavirus: Berlin ad sticks middle finger to mask rule breakers - BBC News
maintext: "I think the ad is in a way 'classic Berlin' and would work out well without the dysfunctional corona-politics of the Senate as a contrast to it," he said.
